DataElement.preferredName: Eligibility Criteria Hypertension Present Initial Visit Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the patient has systolic blood pressure greater than or equal to 140 mmHg or diastolic blood pressure greater than or equal to 90 mmHg.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Hypertension Present First Clinic Patient Visit
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._Blood pressure that is abnormally high._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A health care facility where patients are admitted to get treatment provided by a group of physicians practicing medicine together._A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Property.preferredName: Hypertension Present First Clinic Patient Visit

Concepts.definition: Blood pressure that is abnormally high.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
A health care facility where patients are admitted to get treatment provided by a group of physicians practicing medicine together.
A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for ABTC-1601 study in Rave per request by J.Zhao. mc 1/9/17

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have systoli
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have systolic blood pressure greater than or equal to 140 mmHg or diastolic blood pressure greater than or equal to 90 mmHg? Patients with an initial clinic blood pressure greater than or equal to 140/90 mmHg may be included if a blood pressure less than 140/90 mmHg is confirmed in two subsequent measurements on the same day.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created for 1601 study in Rave per request by J.Zhao. mc 1/9/17
